Description: Broken pendant of dark grey polished stone (haematite or flint?); amuletic function or tool (?).
Curator's comments: Other undecorated black polished pendants were discovered in Naukratis: it is uncertain if they had a ornamental or practical use.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (OK.402)
